titles: A song sung by Mr. Doggett in the comedy called Love for love set to music by Mr. John Eccles.
author: Eccles, John, d. 1735.
Congreve, William, 1670-1729. Love for love.
notes: According to Wing, this song is entitled A soldier and a sailor--see also Wing C5873 on reel 1353.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
